protocol.description: This is a private Gamescope protocol. Regular Wayland clients must not use it.

enum.name: feature
enum.description: Enum of the features supported by Gamescope.

entry.name: done
entry.summary: sent at the end of the feature list

event.name: feature_support
event.description: Says whether a feature is supported and the version.

arg.name: valid_refresh_rates
arg.summary: valid refresh rates for the display for the purposes of combined fps limiting + refresh. empty if fixed at a mode. 32-bit unsigned integers.

entry.name: internal_display
entry.summary: Whether we should change the target refresh cycle under external/internal display

entry.name: allow_refresh_switching
entry.summary: Whether or not to allow refresh rate switching

arg.name: fps
arg.summary: application's target refresh cycle in frames-per-second. 0 = disabled/native
